H0.text: In Scotland, porridge is traditionally made with what. Barley

H1.text: In Scotland, porridge is traditionally made with what. Rye

H2.text: In Scotland, porridge is traditionally made with what. Wheat

H3.text: In Scotland, porridge is traditionally made with what. Oat

A4.text: Oat porridge has traditionally been particularly associated with Scotland, possibly because oats can be successfully cultivated on marginal upland soils.
